interpretation:
Opener has 13-21 points
Usually promises 4+ diamonds with exception of a 4-4-3-2 hand.
Denies 5 card major
Denies ability to open 1NT.

hints.hint1:
Support: 4+ diamonds
Bid higher of 2 5 card suits
Bid lower of 2 4 card suits
2 over 1 suit must be lower than opening suit
Inverted Minor:
	6-10: 3
	11-12: 2
hints.hint2:
Support
	0-5: Pass
	6-10	4+major: 1Ma
		Default: 3D (Inverted minor)
	11-12	Major 5+5: 1S
		Majors 4+4: 1H
		Default: 2D (Inverted minor)
	13+	4+C: 2C (2 over 1)
		Balanced: 2NT
		Default: 2C
No Support
	0-5: Pass
	6-12	Major 5+5: 1S
		Majors 4+4: 1H
		Default: 1NT
	13+	4+C: 2C (2 over 1)
	13-15, Balanced: 2NT
	16-18, Balanced: 3NT
